summary: The Mil Mi-8 is a medium-sized helicopter first made in the Soviet Union in the 1960s. It's still being made in Russia today. This helicopter is mostly used to carry people and things, but it can also be used for military purposes like attacking with guns and watching from above. Over 17,000 of these helicopters have been made, and they are used by many countries around the world. It's one of the most common military helicopters.
title: Mil Mi-8
